name: Racing League: Rifted
description:
Race between alternating realities like you have never before in this new Trackmania X Rocket League inspired game! This is the offical sequel.

Racing League: Rifted is the sequel to the classic presucessor which was released 1st October 2021. 

 This sequel contains a new territory named "Dash". 

 It doesn't look like anything from the classic territory "Racetrack". 

 It features an arcade feel and aesthetic.

https://redshad0w.wixsite.com/racing-league - Offical Website
